history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: Zp_invertible_cancel_l. hauto lq: on use: Zp_mult_zero, Zp_invertible_cancel_l, Zp_mult_comm. qsimpl time: 1 use: Zp_invertible_cancel_l,Zp_mult_assoc. qsimpl time: 1 use: Zp_invertible_cancel_l,Zp_mult_assoc,Zp_mult_zero.

exceptions.exn: In environment p : nat Hp : p <> 0 x, y : Z_Zp Hz : Zp_invertible x Unable to unify "x ⊗ ?M1453 = x ⊗ ?M1454" with "x ⊗ y = Zp".
Found no subterm matching "?M2123 ⊗ ?M2124 ⊗ ?M2125" in the current goal.
The reference Hz was not found in the current environment.
Found no subterm matching "Zp ⊗ ?M2575" in the current goal.

In environment p : nat Hp : p = 0 -> False H5 : forall x, (let (y, _) := x in exist (fun x0 : nat => x0 < p) (rem 0 p) (div_rem_spec2 0 Hp)) = Zp H4 : forall x y z : Z_Zp, x ⊗ (y ⊗ z) = x ⊗ y ⊗ z H : forall x y z : Z_Zp, Zp_invertible x -> x ⊗ y = x ⊗ z -> y = z x, y : Z_Zp H0 : x ⊗ y = Zp x0 : Z_Zp H1 : x0 ⊗ x = Op Unable to unify "Zp" with "y".

original: intros Hz. apply Zp_invertible_cancel_l with (x := x). - auto. - rewrite <- Zp_mult_assoc. rewrite Hz. rewrite Zp_mult_zero. reflexivity.
